titleStmt.title: Sacred hymnes Of 3. 4. 5 and 6. parts for voyces & vyols. Newly composed by Iohn Amner Bachelor of Musique, master of the choristers and organist of the cathedrall church of Ely. ...
titleStmt.author: Amner, John, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Edw: Allde, dwelling neere Christ-Church. Cum priuilegio regali,

notesStmt.note: Six partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. At end of title, part 1, "Cantus primus"; part 2, "Cantus secundus"; part 3, "Tenor."; part 4, "Bassus."; part 5, "Quintus."; part 6, "Sextus.".
